channel.title: My variable, Resets on logout? Help [Pi]
channel.description:
I recently added prestigePoints, to my server it works great.
When you prestige yourself you get 21 Points, and can buy stuff with it at a local prestige shop.
but when you logout it resets to 0. I added a few other variables like donor-points, but i never had a problem with this.
And i made this prestigePoints variable just the same as i made the donor-point variable...
Plz help ;)

item.title: My variable, Resets on logout? Help [Pi]
item.dc:creator: @DevotionPk DevotionPk
item.description:
@DevotionPk wrote:

Ye i did it the right way, but already fixed it.

couldn’t find the problem so just deleted all, and re created it, now it does work

I must mistyped 1 little thing, so ye, but anyways its solved

thx for replies <3

Read full topic
item.source: My variable, Resets on logout? Help [Pi]

item.title: My variable, Resets on logout? Help [Pi]
item.dc:creator: @Ambokile Ambokile
item.description:
@Ambokile wrote:

[quote=“X-J-K-X, post:4, topic:462238”][quote author=Taharahora link=topic=565192.msg4112965#msg4112965 date=1348713422]
you need to add it to playersave.java as well
[/quote]

^

else if (token.equals("character-prestigePoints")) { p.prestigePoints = Integer.parseInt(token2); [/quote]
You’ll need to save it

Read full topic
